n = int(input())
v = list(map(int, input().split()))

# vの中で一番多く出現する数字を出力する(重複している場合はどれでも良い)
# その他の数字は1つである
# それぞれの数字が何回出現したかを記録する
count = [0]*10**5
for i in range(n):
    count[v[i]-1] += 1

# 一番多く出現した数字が何回出現したか
max_count = max(count)
# 一番多く出現した数字が何回出現したかを出力する
print(n - max_count)

# Read input
n = int(input())
v = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Initialise
c = dict()

# Count the number of occurences of each number
for i in range(n):
    if v[i] in c:
        c[v[i]] += 1
    else:
        c[v[i]] = 1

# Get the numbers
keys = list(c.keys())

# Get the number of elements that need to be replaced to make the sequence /\/\/\/
# In the case of the sample input: n = 4, keys = [3,1], count = [2,2]
# Since the sequence needs to have exactly 2 different numbers, we need to replace 2-2=0 elements
if len(keys) == 2:
    print(abs(n/2 - c[keys[0]]))
# In the case of a sequence that has more than 2 different numbers, we need to replace all the elements
else:
    print(n)

# -----Input-----
n = int(input())
v = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

# -----Output-----
print(len(v) - max(v.count(x) for x in set(v)))
